document_data.name: Bloodhook
document_data.mainbody: '''''Bloodhook''''' was a spell known to the [[archdevil]] [[Harhoring]].
document_data.Effect: Harhoring appeared to expect that it pulled a target to the caster, torn open and in their death agonies.
document_data.History: The spell was used by [[Harhoring]] against [[the Simbul]] in {{yearlink|1372}}, during her scouring of [[Avernus]] in search of [[Elminster]].
